title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.115 - Equity ownership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.115 - Equity ownership

State Regulations
(a) The
interest of an owner in property or in a business or other organization, subject, in case of liquidation, to prior claim of creditors. (b) The interest (paid-in capital and
retained earnings) of a stockholder or of stockholders collectively in a
corporation; proprietorship. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.115

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
